content: Codewars' search index sometimes just fails to update :shrug:
@Donald Sebastian Leung and why can't I still find it?

Codewars' background processes are known to be optimistic so it probably tried to update the search index just once (when the Lean translation to "Real Chebyshev" was accepted) but failed silently for whatever reason. We can ask kazk to manually update the search index if you wish.
@Donald Sebastian Leung I was afraid that everything stopped updating because indeed there are no new results for 2 days now
I'll poke kazk in the Gitter chat to update the search index
